actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to modify the dairy price support program for the 1984 through 1987 fiscal years, and for other purposes.
short_title: Consumers and Dairy Producers Fairness Act of 1983

summary.text: Consumers and Dairy Producers Fairness Act of 1983 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended by the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982, to repeal the 50-cent milk producer assessments. Reduces FY 1984 milk support prices from $14.00 per hundredweight to $12.50 per hundredweight. Provides for 50-cent price support decreases if Government purchases are in excess of specified levels on October 1, 1984, and October 1, 1985, respectively. Requires a report by July 1, 1984, on the effect of applying nationally fluid milk standards similar to those in California.

titles.title: Consumers and Dairy Producers Fairness Act of 1983
A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to modify the dairy price support program for the 1984 through 1987 fiscal years, and for other purposes.
